current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_address_found_1: Railroad easement behind 2181 W. Main St.
case_circumstances: White male adult found at transient camp near railroad.  Documentation indicated that the subject had received treatment at a local hospital for a severe skin condition (Eczema, arms and legs).  Provided name "Charles Gordon" with DOB: 06/16/1959.  Designated "John Doe #55-03".
